title: Sonny Chiba - Masutatsu Oyama Trilogy
description:
Three action packed films starring Sonny Chiba are included. This trilogy is based on the life of Chiba's mentor, master Masutatsu Oyama. In Karate Bear Fighter, Oyama wins the all-Japan Karate tournament, but those in the conventional karate world are resentful of his skill and try to banish him. In Karate Bull Fighter, Oyama denounces martial arts after killing a gang leader in a bar fight. In Karate for Life, the Karate Society of Japan ostracizes Oyama after fighting both a bull and a bear. But during a promoter prearranged game where the opponents play dirty, Oyama loses all self-control.

This collection presents all three films in the MAS OYAMA trilogy, which finds martial arts legend Sonny Chiba playing the role of his real-life mentor Masutatsu Oyama, who was famous for creating a new form of karate in the postwar period. The first of the films, KARATE BULL FIGHTER (1975), is the story of Oyama's humble beginnings as a penniless hopeful. In KARATE BEAR FIGHTER (1975), Oyama wins a nationwide tournament using his new style. And in KARATE FOR LIFE (1977), the newly minted master sets up his own dojo.
